name: Scarlet In The Dark
description:
Scarlet - Monster living in abandoned mines.

36 years before the event.

Miners as usual extracted minerals, but the mine was not the same as usual, a week later began to disappear miners, all thought that they just lost somewhere, after 2 weeks, many miners talked about some visions, no one knew what was happening in the depths of this mine, for 3 weeks the work was stopped there, and there was a special investigation team, but it found nothing. Now the entrance to the cave is not controlled and it is considered abandoned.

The main character inspired by this story wants to know what is going on in these mines.
